item.text: <st data-num="03588" class="">Suppose</st> a <st data-num="05030" class="">prophet</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> one who <st data-num="02492" class="">foretells</st> by <st data-num="02472" class="">dreams</st><n id="1" /> should <st data-num="06965" class="">appear</st> <st data-num="07130" class="">among</st> you and <st data-num="05414" class="">show</st> you a <st data-num="0226" class="">sign</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="04159" class="">wonder</st>,<n id="2" />

and the <st data-num="0226" class="">sign</st> or <st data-num="04159" class="">wonder</st> should <st data-num="0935" class="">come to pass</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">concerning what</st> he <st data-num="01696" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you, <st data-num="0559" class="">namely</st>, “Let us <st data-num="01980 0310">follow</st> <st data-num="0312" class="">other</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st>”—gods <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> you have <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> previously <st data-num="03045" class="">known</st>—“and let us <st data-num="05647" class="">serve</st> them.”
You must not listen to the words of that prophet or dreamer, for the Lord your God will be testing you to see if you love him with all your mind and being.
You must follow the Lord your God and revere only him; and you must observe his commandments, obey him, serve him, and remain loyal to him.

As for that prophet or dreamer, he must be executed because he encouraged rebellion against the Lord your God who brought you from the land of Egypt, redeeming you from that place of slavery, and because he has tried to entice you from the way the Lord your God has commanded you to go. In this way you must purge evil from among you.

Suppose your own full brother, your son, your daughter, your beloved wife, or your closest friend should seduce you secretly and encourage you to go and serve other gods that neither you nor your ancestors have previously known,

the <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st> of the <st data-num="05439" class="">surrounding</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> (whether <st data-num="07138" class="">near</st> you <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="07350" class="">far</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> you, from one <st data-num="07097" class="">end</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="07097 0776">other</st>).

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="014" class="">give in</st> to him <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> even <st data-num="08085" class="">listen</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him; do <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02347 05869">feel sympathy</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">for</st> him <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> <st data-num="02550" class="">spare</st> him <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> <st data-num="03680" class="">cover up</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">for</st> him.

<st data-num="03588" class="">Instead</st>, you must <st data-num="02026" class="">kill</st> him <st data-num="02026" class="">without fail</st>!<n id="1" /> Your own <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st> must <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> the <st data-num="07223" class="">first</st> to <st data-num="04191" class="">strike</st> him,<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="0314" class="">then</st> the <st data-num="03027" class="">hands</st> of the <st data-num="03605" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">community</st>.
You must stone him to death because he tried to entice you away from the Lord your God, who delivered you from the land of Egypt, that place of slavery.
Thus all Israel will hear and be afraid; no longer will they continue to do evil like this among you.
Suppose you should hear in one of your cities, which the Lord your God is giving you as a place to live, that

<st data-num="0376" class="">some</st> <st data-num="01100" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">people</st><n id="1" /> have <st data-num="03318" class="">departed</st> from <st data-num="07130" class="">among</st> you to <st data-num="05080" class="">entice</st> the <st data-num="03427" class="">inhabitants</st> of their <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">saying</st>, “Let’s <st data-num="01980" class="">go</st> and <st data-num="05647" class="">serve</st> <st data-num="0312" class="">other</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st>” (<st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> you have <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03045" class="">known</st> before).<n id="3" />

You must <st data-num="01875" class="">investigate</st> <st data-num="02713" class="">thoroughly</st> and <st data-num="07592" class="">inquire</st> <st data-num="03190" class="">carefully</st>. If <st data-num="01697" class="">it</st> <st data-num="03559" class="">is</st> <st data-num="02009" class="">indeed</st> <st data-num="0571">true</st> that <st data-num="02063" class="">such</st> a <st data-num="08441" class="">disgraceful thing</st> is being <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st> <st data-num="07130" class="">among</st> you,<n id="1" />

you must <st data-num="05221" class="">by all means</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05221" class="">slaughter</st> the <st data-num="03427" class="">inhabitants</st> of <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> with the <st data-num="06310 02719">sword</st>; <st data-num="02763" class="">annihilate</st><n id="2" /> with the <st data-num="06310 02719">sword</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">everyone</st> in it, as well as the <st data-num="0929" class="">livestock</st>.

You must gather all of its plunder into the middle of the plaza and burn the city and all its plunder as a whole burnt offering to the Lord your God. It will be an abandoned ruin forever—it must never be rebuilt again.

You must not take for yourself anything that has been placed under judgment. Then the Lord will relent from his intense anger, show you compassion, have mercy on you, and multiply you as he promised your ancestors.
Thus you must obey the Lord your God, keeping all his commandments that I am giving you today and doing what is right before him.
